Production Time

All our products are handcrafted to order. Please allow 5-7 working days for production before your item is shipped.

UK Shipping Options

Standard Delivery (£4.99)
• 3-5 working days
• Tracked service
• Available Monday-Friday

Express Delivery (£9.99)
• 1-2 working days
• Tracked & signed for
• Available Monday-Friday

Free Shipping
• Orders over £50
• Standard delivery timing applies

Order Processing

Orders placed before 2pm Monday-Friday will be processed the same day. Weekend orders will be processed on the following Monday.

Tracking Information

Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can track your package directly with the courier.

International Shipping

We currently only ship within the UK. We're working to expand internationally - follow us on social media for updates!

Special Circumstances

Peak Seasons: During busy periods (holidays, sales), production and shipping times may be extended. We'll notify you of any delays.

Custom Orders: Bespoke pieces may take 2-3 weeks to complete depending on complexity.

Shipping Address

Please ensure your shipping address is correct before completing your order. We cannot be responsible for packages sent to incorrect addresses provided by the customer.

Damaged Packages

If your package arrives damaged, please contact us within 48 hours with photos. We'll arrange a replacement immediately.
